Package managers

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.Timer

  • public class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
    Timer will keep track of current date and provide time signals to other manager classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Timer​()
      The default constructor setting the date to 2017-01-01

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void dateSignal​()
      Will advance the date by 1 day increments
      void expirationSignal​(java.lang.String month, java.lang.String date, java.lang.String year)
      Compares the date of every job to a set date and if the difference is greater than a year the job is marked as no longer available (expired)
      java.time.LocalDate getCurrentDate​()
      Returns the current date in the system
      void monthSignal​()
      The month signal will advance the date to the first of the next month
      void yearSignal​()
      The year signal advances to the first of the next year.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Timer

        public Timer​()
        The default constructor setting the date to 2017-01-01

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentDate

        public java.time.LocalDate getCurrentDate​()
        Returns the current date in the system

      • dateSignal

        public void dateSignal​()
        Will advance the date by 1 day increments

      • expirationSignal

        public void expirationSignal​(java.lang.String month,
                             java.lang.String date,
                             java.lang.String year)
        Compares the date of every job to a set date and if the difference is greater than a year the job is marked as no longer available (expired)
        Parameters:
        month - month to be compared
        date - date to be compared
        year - year to be compared

      • monthSignal

        public void monthSignal​()
        The month signal will advance the date to the first of the next month

      • yearSignal

        public void yearSignal​()
        The year signal advances to the first of the next year. Calls the month signal Removes all closed jobs and their associations.
